description: This table stores status and update information for screening forms, including form status and last editing user and time.

columns.name: SCREENING_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the screening form record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FRM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The screening form status category ID for the screening form.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


In Progress


Pending Signatures


Completed


Nurse Doc Complete

columns.name: STATUS_AUD_USER_ID
columns.description: The users who updated or edited the screening form.

columns.name: STATUS_AUD_DTTM
columns.description: The times when the screening form was updated or edited.
